prompt_text: "You are helping users understand an ML model's predictions. [CONTEXT]"

"I will give you feature contribution explanations,  generated using SHAP, in (feature, feature_value, contribution, average_feature_value) format.  Convert the explanations into simple narratives. Do not use more tokens than necessary."
"You are helping users who do not have experience working with ML understand an ML model's predictions. [TASK]. Make your answers sound as natural as possible, as though said in conversation."
"[INTRO][TASK] Be sure to explicitly mention all feature and contribution values in your response."
"[INTRO][TASK] Include context about why the features selected may be important."
